tool_description: Creates new patient appointments with healthcare providers, validates scheduling rules, and confirms bookings with automatic conflict prevention.

appointment_type.description: Type of appointment: consultation, follow-up, procedure, emergency

notes.description: Additional appointment notes or special requirements

error_messages: Provider not found: No provider exists with the specified provider_id
Time slot unavailable: The requested time slot is already booked or outside provider hours
Invalid appointment type: Must be one of [consultation, follow-up, procedure, emergency]
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 15 and 180 minutes
Missing patient contact: Either patient_phone or patient_email is required
Past appointment time: Cannot schedule appointments in the past
Invalid phone format: Phone number must be in valid format
Scheduling conflict: Provider has a conflicting appointment at the requested time
usage: Provide patient details, provider_id, appointment_datetime, and appointment_type. The tool will validate availability and create the appointment if possible.

appointment_id.description: Unique identifier for the created appointment

confirmation_number.description: Patient confirmation number for the appointment
